description:
.NET Core is a general purpose development platform maintained by Microsoft and the .NET community on GitHub. It is cross-platform, supporting Windows, macOS and Linux, and can be used in device, cloud, and embedded/IoT scenarios.

The SDK includes the runtime and command line tools for creating .NET applications.

This is a *metapackage*, which installs the latest release of .NET SDK across all versions.
summary: The SDK includes the runtime and command line tools for creating .NET applications.
author: Microsoft
